committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 5197 of the Revised Statutes to limit the rate of interest a national bank may charge its out of State customers.

summary.text: Limits the rate of interest that a national bank may charge an out of State credit card customer.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5197 of the Revised Statutes to limit the rate of interest a national bank may charge its out of State customers.
